resources.string: Enter a name for the flight
Welcome to OLANdroid ‐ a tool for modelling the acrobatic flights of aircraft using the OLAN notation. There\'s help available for the app using the question mark in the action bar.
Browse flights & load them by tapping on them, with a long press for additional operations. Build a new flight by tapping the plus in the action bar.

Build a flight using an OLAN string. Browse manoeuvres in the catalogue below & tap to add them to the current flight (long tap to see their Aresti diagrams), or type them directly into the text box.
Some OLAN figures support modifiers & can have ‘+/`’ before &/or after them to extend their entry & exit paths/scale parts of the manoeuvre. Manoeuvres can be fully scaled by preceding them with a ‘2%’ for example to scale it.

(One or two finger) tap & drag to rotate around the flight. Pinch to zoom in & out. Use the play/pause button on the action bar to play & pause the animation, the progress bar at the bottom can be used to step through its progress too. The control scheme & animation speed can changed in the settings menu.
